cleaned_text: Scope of Practice in Arizona for licensed Naturopathic Physicians: - Clinical Nutrition - Mind/Body Therapy - Physical Manipulation - Acupuncture - Botanical Medicine - Homeopathic Medicine - Minor Surgery - Dietary Supplementation - Pharmaceutical prescription Medication Dr. Ellie Wright NMD Magnolia Personalized Medicine Integrative and functional medicine focusing on advanced health and wellness and the prevention, treatment and reversal of chronic diseases by addressing the root cause. Delivering personalized and precision medicine, incorporating functional health assessment, diagnostic and specialty laboratory and DNA nutrition testing, Mold testing, Heavy metal testing, advanced hormone testing, gut testing, allergies testing. Practice that includes focus on education on nutrition, diet, lifestyle factors, herbal medicine and natural medicine.
